original: Åringr, Oscar Albert Harry, direktör, Borås, f. 4/12/98 i Nårunga, Älvsb. 1. G. 30 m, Marget Danielsson. Barn: Marita f. 38. — Avg:ex. v. Borås tekn. vävsk. 23. Vol. v. Maschinen-Fabr. Rüti 23-24. Ärl. res. t. Tyskl. o. Belg. 34-38, t. Frankr. o. Belg. 37. Mönsterrit. v. Viskabergs Fabr. 24-27, vävmäst. v. A-B Sjuntorp 27-28, inköpschef v. A-B Textilkomp. 28-33, diisp. v. A-B Borås Draperi- & Gardin-fabr. fr. 33. Sekr. i Heminredn :bransch. textilfabr :ifören. fr. 42.
translated:
Oscar Albert Harry Åringr, director, Borås, born on December 4, 1898 in Nårunga, Älvsborg. First marriage in 1930 with Marget Danielsson. They had one child: Marita, born in 1938. 

Education: completed vocational training at Borås Technical Weaving School in 1923. Volunteered at Maschinen-Fabrik Rüti in 1923-1924. Served as an honorable reserve in Germany and Belgium from 1934-1938, and in France and Belgium in 1937. Worked as a pattern designer at Viskabergs Fabrik from 1924-1927, master weaver at A-B Sjuntorp from 1927-1928, purchasing manager at A-B Textile Company from 1928-1933, and as a deputy at A-B Borås Drapery & Curtain Factory starting from 1933. 

Secretary in the Home Furnishing Textile Manufacturing Association from 1942 onwards.
